owner.title: A little about me
owner.description:
I'm a 33yo Front End Developer, and currently, Team Manager and Frontend Developer at Acotel Interactive, brazilian office. I work with multiples projects with multiple offices around the world. I have full experience on HTML/JS/CSS, AngularJS, jQuery, SASS/LESS. Belive me, I love what I do.

To know more about this HTML, please go to my GitHub project.
